# Annual Fire Inspection Tender Announcement

## Title
The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) is seeking a contractor to perform annual fire inspections at various Regional Headquarters (RHQ) and National Training Academy (NTA) complex buildings in accordance with the National Fire Code (NFC) 2020 Division B.

## Reference Number
cb-6018-33520748

## Tender Information

* **Publication Date**: May 31, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: June 30, 2023 at 10:00 AM
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: July 1, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: June 30, 2028

## Notice Details

* **Request for Proposal (RFP)**: Request for Proposal (Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

## Region of Opportunity
Kingston, Ontario

## Region of Delivery
Kingston, Ontario

## Contracting Entity Information

* **Correctional Service of Canada**
* **Contracting Authority Contact**: Darrin Molleson, [darrin.molleson@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:darrin.molleson@csc-scc.gc.ca), (613) 329-1381

## Tender Requirement

The Correctional Service of Canada has a requirement to complete annual inspections of fire alarm systems at various Regional Headquarters (RHQ) and National Training Academy (NTA) complex buildings. The contractor must supply a report, including a list of all deficiencies and remedial action required, at the completion of each annual inspection.

## Important Information

* **Security Requirements**: This contract does not include security requirements.
* **Estimated Quantity of Commodity**: Please refer to the solicitation document for details.
* **Notice URL**: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/tenders
* **Tender Description**: Please refer to the solicitation document for details.

ATTENTION BIDDERS

Bidders can obtain the complete statement of work and evaluation criteria by downloading the solicitation document and associated documents from BuyAndSell.gc.ca/tenders.

The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French).
